name: SuperNova (itch)
description:
This is a multiplayer-clicker-space game.

You and your co players must in three minutes provide energy to the mothership and escape the supernova explosion. Choose your bonus, ship and hit the loadingbay and fill your stock. Warp to the nearest galaxy and collect energy and upgrade your drones and ship. Unfreeze your crew and put them to work in the research department. Make sure you can do the next warp before it's too late.

Try the game in your browser: https://supernova.theanykey.se/
